item.title: OpenAI rolls out ChatGPT Search to all users, with Maps and Advanced Voice features coming up - The Indian Express
item.description:
OpenAI Expands ChatGPT Search to All Users, Adding Maps and Advanced Voice Features

Date & Source: December 16, Indian Express

Introduction: OpenAI has announced that its ChatGPT Search feature is now available to all users, both on mobile and desktop platforms. The feature was previously limited to ChatGPT Plus and Team plan subscribers.

  • ChatGPT Search can be set as the default search engine in web browsers.
  • OpenAI is developing its own web browser to compete with Google Chrome.
  • Maps will be integrated into ChatGPT mobile apps for local business searches.
  • Advanced Voice Mode will be added to ChatGPT Search over the next week.
“We’re also adding maps to ChatGPT in our mobile apps, so you can search for and chat about local restaurants and businesses with up-to-date information,” the company said in a post on X.

Conclusion: This expansion is part of OpenAI's '12 Days' Ship-mas event, which includes new products like the text-to-video generator Sora and a $200 per month subscription package called ChatGPT Pro. The announcement highlights OpenAI's ongoing efforts to enhance its AI offerings and compete in the tech market.

item.title: Most Premium Phones Have Got These Big Changes In 2024 And We Like It - News18
item.description:
Most Premium Phones Have Got These Big Changes In 2024 And We Like It

Date: December 17, 2024 Source: News18

This article discusses the significant changes in high-end smartphones in 2024, focusing on their evolving features that enhance user experience.

  • High-end smartphones are increasingly recognized for their distinct premium identity.
  • Several key updates have been implemented this year to improve functionality and user satisfaction.
  • The article highlights the latest innovations and features included in the 2024 premium smartphone lineup.
“The evolving identity of premium smartphones makes them better to use.”

The advancements in premium smartphones for 2024 promise to transform how users interact with their devices, making them more intuitive and enjoyable.

item.title: Google Drive upgrades document scanner with new feature on Android - The Hindu
item.description:
Google Drive Improves Document Scanner with New Enhance Feature on Android

Date & Source: December 17, 2024 - The Hindu

Google Drive is adding a new automatic “Enhance” feature for its document scanner on Android. After capturing an image, users can use the tool on the Preview screen for white balance correction, shadow removal, contrast enrichment, auto sharpening, light improvement and other editing features.

  1. The tool includes white balance correction, shadow removal, contrast enrichment, auto sharpening, and light improvement.
  2. The update aims to make images of receipts, documents, and ID cards clearer without manual editing.
  3. The feature is being rolled out gradually and will be available for Google Workspace customers, Workspace Individual subscribers, and users with personal Google accounts.
The new update is being rolled out gradually and users are advised to make sure they’re running the latest version of Google Drive on their Android phones to avail it.

The improvements ensure that users don't need any manual editing and can achieve clearer images of receipts, documents, and ID cards.

item.title: iPhone 15 256GB variant gets huge price drop, check cheapest deal here - India TV News
item.description:
iPhone 15 256GB variant gets huge price drop, check cheapest deal here

Publication Date: December 14, 2024 | Source: India TV News

The price of the iPhone 15 has seen another significant reduction, making it more accessible on popular e-commerce sites. A price cut of Rs 10,000 was implemented following the launch of the iPhone 16, especially on the 256GB variant.

Key Points:

  • 256GB variant available on Flipkart for Rs 70,999, with a potential final price of Rs 69,999 after discounts.
  • Amazon lists the 256GB variant at Rs 75,900, with potential final price of Rs 71,900 after discounts.
  • The iPhone 15 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display and A16 Bionic chipset.
  • Also includes a dual-camera setup with a 48MP main camera.
“BSNL aims to reach a total of 100,000 4G sites by mid-2025 and is preparing for the launch of its 5G services.”

This new price drop of the iPhone 15, particularly for the 256GB variant, presents an exciting opportunity for consumers looking to upgrade their devices.

item.title: Apple’s iOS 18.2 introduces Genmoji: How to create custom Emojis with a touch of AI - The Financial Express
item.description:
Discover Genmoji in Apple’s iOS 18.2!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: FE Tech Bytes

As Apple releases its iPadOS 18.2 and iOS 18.2, it introduces Genmoji, a feature that allows users to create custom emojis using Apple’s artificial intelligence.

How to use Genmoji

  • Open a conversation and click on the text field.
  • Tap the smiley icon or globe icon.
  • Describe the emoji you want to create and click “Done.”
  • Share your personalized emoji.

You can also delete a Genmoji by accessing the emoji keyboard, selecting it, and choosing the ‘remove’ option.

Understanding Genmoji

Genmoji are custom emojis created based on user descriptions, leveraging Apple Intelligence. For instance, typing ‘cat singing’ prompts the AI to generate a corresponding emoji.

Additionally, users can create emojis based on images of people they know by using their pictures as a reference for customization.

Follow FE Tech Bytes on Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

item.title: Apple working on a new iPad-like foldable device: Report - The Hindu
item.description:
Apple Working on a New Foldable iPad-Like Device Set for 2028 Release

Published on: December 17, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

Apple is reportedly set to release a large foldable iPad-like device by 2028. Leaked information suggests the device could serve dual functions as either a Mac or an iPad.

  • The foldable device is expected to be 18.8 inches with an almost invisible crease.
  • Rumors of this product have been circulating, with various reports suggesting Apple aims to enter the foldable market.
  • Apple also plans to release OLED MacBook Pros in 2026 and an updated MacBook Air in 2027.
  • A foldable iPhone is also in development but is not expected to be released before 2026.
“Apple hasn't confirmed these reports yet.”

In conclusion, Apple’s advance into foldable technology with a potential release of a large foldable iPad device highlights its innovative trajectory in the tech space.

item.title: WhatsApp will soon bring in-app call dialer for iPhone users - India Today
item.description:
WhatsApp Introduces In-App Call Dialer for iPhone Users

Published On: Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Unnati Gusain

WhatsApp is rolling out an in-app call dialer feature for iOS users, aiming to enhance user experience by allowing direct phone calls from the app.

  • The in-app call dialer is currently in beta testing for iOS users.
  • This feature enables users to dial numbers directly, independent of WhatsApp's contact list.
  • It is expected to integrate smoothly with existing WhatsApp functions, such as transitioning between voice and video calls.
  • The addition may increase user engagement by providing more comprehensive communication options.
  • This rollout may raise competitive concerns with telecom services and other VoIP providers.
"WhatsApp’s upcoming in-app call dialer feature is a promising development that underscores the platform’s commitment to innovation and user convenience."

item.title: Immortality In Metaverse: Exploring Social, Legal & Psychological Challenges - Live Law - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Immortality In Metaverse: Exploring Social, Legal & Psychological Challenges

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

As technology advances, the concept of immortality within the metaverse raises unique social, legal, and psychological challenges. This research analyzes the implications of having AI-driven avatars that may continue to exist and operate long after a user's physical death.

  • The metaverse combines AI, AR, VR, and blockchain technologies to create immersive digital environments.
  • Increased life expectancy has led to discussions on digital immortality, where avatars may represent deceased users.
  • Concerns include avatar autonomy, potential identity manipulation, and the need for global regulatory frameworks.
  • The paper explores the ethical implications of avatars carrying on after users' deaths, raising questions about liability and privacy.
“The soul is immortal” - a sentiment that echoes both socially and legally as we consider digital legacies.

The future of digital immortality in the metaverse remains uncertain but poses significant questions about identity, ethics, and the essence of being human.

item.title: Sony settles US consumer lawsuit over PlayStation game sales - The Hindu
item.description:
Sony Settles Lawsuit Over PlayStation Game Sales

Date: December 17, 2024
Source: The Hindu

Sony has agreed to settle a federal lawsuit over digital game sales for its PlayStation console, which claimed customers were made to overpay for games.

  • Sony will distribute $7.85 million in electronic credits to affected PlayStation customers.
  • The lawsuit was filed by plaintiffs estimating a class size of over 4.4 million individuals.
  • The case centers on Sony's restrictions that barred retailers from offering game-specific vouchers.
  • Sony denied any wrongdoing but agreed to settle to avoid further litigation costs.
  • The settlement will cover purchases from April 2019 to December 2023.
“They said they will ask the court to award them up to about 33% of the settlement for legal fees, or about $2.61 million.”

The settlement awaits approval in court, marking a significant moment for PlayStation customers impacted by high game prices.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Price In India, USA, Dubai, Launch Date, Full Specs, Design, Leaks: What To Expect At - Times Now
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra: Price, Launch Date, Specs, and Design Expectations

Publication Date: TBD | Source: TNN

The highly anticipated Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is generating excitement among fans with rumored upgrades in design, hardware, and camera technology. Set to be unveiled in early 2025, it aims to redefine smartphone standards.

  • New flat-frame design, making the phone slimmer at just 8.4mm.
  • 6.8-inch AMOLED 2X display with a 120Hz refresh rate for enhanced visuals.
  • Powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset with impressive benchmark scores.
  • Expected camera upgrades include a 200MP primary sensor and a new 50MP ultrawide lens.
  • Launch expected at Unpacked Event in late January or early February 2025, with possible price increases over the S24 Ultra.
“The phone could come with up to 16GB of RAM and UFS 4.1 storage for faster multitasking.”

The Galaxy S25 Ultra promises to be a significant upgrade from its predecessor, with a focus on design and technological advancements, setting high expectations for its launch.

item.title: Google to launch gen AI experiment 'Whisk' today: 'Now prompt with images' | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Google to launch gen AI experiment ’Whisk’ today: ’Now prompt with images’

Publication Date: Today

Source: Live Mint

Google introduces Whisk, a new creative tool that allows users to input images and remix them to create unique items like digital plushies and stickers. The platform utilizes the Gemini model and Imagen 3 for image generation and creative exploration.

  • Users can input images for subjects, scenes, and styles.
  • Whisk automatically generates captions for images and captures their essence rather than simply replicating them.
  • The tool allows easy remixing of elements, facilitating innovative visual exploration.
  • Generated images may differ from expectations due to the extraction of key features alone.
  • Designed for fast exploration, Whisk encourages experimentation rather than precise editing.
“The goal is to enable users to explore ideas innovatively, allowing them to experiment with numerous options.”

Whisk represents a shift in how users can create and explore digital content, opening new avenues for creativity.

item.title: Panasonic Announces Two New Cameras: Compact Micro Four Thirds LUMIX G97 and Pocket-Sized Travel Zoom LUMIX ZS99 - Panasonic Canada
item.description:
Panasonic Announces Two New Cameras: Compact Micro Four Thirds LUMIX G97 and Pocket-Sized Travel Zoom LUMIX ZS99

Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: Panasonic

Panasonic introduces the LUMIX G97 and ZS99, focusing on enhanced image quality and usability for photographers and videographers. The G97 features 4K recording, while the ZS99 offers a powerful 30x zoom in a compact design.

  • The LUMIX ZS99 includes a 24-720mm LEICA DC lens, achieving 30x optical zoom.
  • 4K video recording at 30p ensures high-quality capture of moving moments.
  • The G97 allows bursts of high-resolution photos at 30fps, ideal for fast-moving subjects.
  • Both models support Bluetooth and Wi-Fi for easy connectivity.
  • The ZS99 is priced at $499.99, available February 2024; while the G97 will cost $849.99, available late February 2024.
"LUMIX continues to develop its lineup to satisfy the needs of a wide range of creators and continually deliver value, innovation, and reliability to its customers." - Panasonic

In conclusion, Panasonic’s new LUMIX cameras aim to enhance the photography experience by integrating advanced features in compact forms, catering to both casual users and serious enthusiasts.

item.title: ChatGPT Update: Free Web Search, New Voice & Maps Features - Search Engine Journal
item.description:
ChatGPT Update: Free Web Search, New Voice & Maps Features

Publication Date: December 16, 2024

Source: OpenAI

OpenAI has updated ChatGPT to make web search available to all registered users. The update also includes voice search and maps integration.

  • Web search is now available for all users, not just Plus subscribers.
  • Advanced voice search feature enables users to make inquiries in multiple languages.
  • Maps integration helps users find local businesses and restaurants.
  • Improved user experience for navigational queries in web browsers.
“🌐ChatGPT search 🌐is starting to roll out to all Free users today.” — OpenAI (@OpenAI)

This update marks a significant expansion of ChatGPT’s features for all users, enhancing accessibility and functionality.

item.title: Google debuts Veo 2 video generator, upgraded Imagen 3 - SiliconANGLE News
item.description:
Google debuts Veo 2 video generator, upgraded Imagen 3 with Whisk remix tool

Published on: Today | Source: SiliconANGLE

Google LLC has introduced Veo 2, an AI model that generates high-resolution videos up to two minutes long, alongside an upgraded version of Imagen 3 and a new remix tool called Whisk.

  • Veo 2 creates videos from natural language prompts, allowing users to describe scenes in detail.
  • The model can simulate camera settings and apply cinematic effects, producing 4K resolution clips.
  • In testing, Veo 2 outperformed competitors on overall preference and accuracy in following prompts.
  • The new version of Imagen 3 offers improved image quality and adherence to user prompts.
  • Whisk allows users to remix images, applying styles from one image to another's background.
“It brings an improved understanding of real-world physics and the nuances of human movement and expression,” said Aäron van den Oord, research scientist at Google DeepMind.

Veo 2 will initially be available through Google Labs, with plans for integration into products like YouTube Shorts and Google Cloud's Vertex AI.

item.title: WhatsApp Will Soon Get A Dialer On iPhones To Make It Easy For Calls: Know More - News18
item.description:
WhatsApp Will Soon Get A Dialer On iPhones To Make It Easy For Calls

Date: December 16, 2024 Source: News18

WhatsApp is enhancing its app for iPhone users by introducing a dialer tab, aimed at consolidating messaging and calling functions within the app, allowing users to make calls directly from it.

  • WhatsApp will introduce a dialer tab for iPhone users.
  • This feature allows users to call others without leaving the WhatsApp app.
  • The dialer will open when clicking the + icon on the WhatsApp feed.
  • The feature is also aimed to enhance the app's integration for users, as available on Android.
  • WhatsApp will limit calls to the app's ecosystem, potentially creating issues in regions heavily reliant on traditional calling.
  • Recent updates have improved video call quality and group calling functionalities.
“Having its own dialer app means WhatsApp users don’t need to rely on the default dialer that is provided by Google and Apple.”

This new dialer feature aims to provide a more integrated experience for WhatsApp users on iPhones, though it may have limitations in markets where traditional phones dominate.

item.title: ChatGPT’s AI search engine is rolling out to everyone - The Verge
item.description:
ChatGPT’s AI Search Engine Now Available to All Users

Publication Date: October 31, 2024 Source: The Verge

OpenAI has officially rolled out ChatGPT’s AI search engine to all users, enhancing its capabilities and making it accessible to free tier accounts.

  • ChatGPT’s search engine was initially available only to paid subscribers.
  • The mobile version has been optimized to resemble traditional search engines, providing lists of results with images and ratings.
  • New fast search options allow quicker access to specific types of sites.
  • Advanced Voice Mode now delivers real-time web information for paid users.
“ChatGPT will display a list of results with accompanying images, ratings, and hours for local searches.”

This expansion marks a significant step for OpenAI in making AI-driven search more accessible and user-friendly.
